Title: Basic points of the general line of socialist construction
Designer: Tianjin People's Fine Arts Publishing House (天津人民美术出版社)
Publisher: Tianjin People's Fine Arts Publishing House (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: The second poster of a four poster set from 1958, "The General Line in socialist construction explained in pictures" (社会主义建设总路线图解).These basic points include: taking Mao Zedong's On the Correct Handling of Contradictions among the People (关于正确处理人民内部矛盾的问题), first published in 1957, to heart; a balanced development of industry and agriculture; a balanced development of industry, giving equal weight to central and local industries.
Tags: On the Correct Handling of Contradictions among the People
